entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming northeast 30 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
